body: i’m thankful that after i wrote that and felt such despair i took out the trash and walked the dog down the trail and came back in and we slow danced crying to kacey musgraves on the speakers as incense smoke floated through the house, the sky finally open, the rain and wind stopped blowing, a rainbow over our heads.
normalized_markdown: i’m thankful that after i wrote that and felt such despair i took out the trash and walked the dog down the trail and came back in and we slow danced crying to kacey musgraves on the speakers as incense smoke floated through the house, the sky finally open, the rain and wind stopped blowing, a rainbow over our heads.
